labels.label: [options] ... repo=Repository-name
Options (brief detail)
Refer to the svnMakeRepo man-page for details.

var.name: branch
var.use: branch = trunk|branches|tags == Branch to store optional source in

var.name: repo
var.use: repo = repository-name == Name of the repository to make

var.name: quiet
var.use: quiet = 0|1 == enable/disable output to the console

var.name: service
var.use: service = Apache-service == Command to restart the Apache server

var.name: source
var.use: source = repository-source == Location of the source to load

var.name: svn
var.use: svn = path == Path to parent of the svn folder

var.name: svnname
var.use: svnname = svn-directory-name == Svn repository name (no path)

var.name: svnuser
var.use: svnuser = group-user == Svn repository user name
